BackstoryDef.title: divorce kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was fortunate enough to attend one of the best private schools on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was also unfortuante enough to see [PAWN_possessive] parents separate at a young age.

BackstoryDef.title: pet torturer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s affluent family helped conceal [PAWN_possessive] habit of torturing animals.\n\nDespite years of therapy, [PAWN_pronoun] could never bring [PAWN_objective]self to interact with the little beasts in any normal way. [PAWN_pronoun] did learn a few things about how bodies live and die.

BackstoryDef.title: political climber
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a smart kid, so everyone encouraged [PAWN_possessive] ambition to become a politician.

[PAWN_pronoun] would use any tactic to win, including direct psychological attacks.

During one school election, the other candidate hung himself. [PAWN_nameDef] won by default.
